014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
025
026import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
027
028import org.microbean.qualifier.NamedAttributeMap;
029
030import org.microbean.scope.ScopeMember;
031
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_int;
034import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_List;
035
036import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Id;
037import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_BeanTypeList;
038
039import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_NamedAttributeMap;
040
041public final record Id(BeanTypeList types,
042                       List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
043                       NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId,
044                       int rank)
045  implements Alternate, Constable, ScopeMember {
046
047  public Id(final TypeMirror type,
048            final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
049            final NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId) {
050    this(new BeanTypeList(type), attributes, governingScopeId, Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK);
051  }
052
053  public Id(final List<? extends TypeMirror> types,
054            final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
055            final NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId) {
056    this(new BeanTypeList(types), attributes, governingScopeId, Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK);
057  }
058
059  public Id(final BeanTypeList types,
060            final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
061            final NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId) {
062    this(types, attributes, governingScopeId, Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK);
063  }
064
065  public Id {
066    types = Objects.requireNonNull(types, "types");
067    attributes = List.copyOf(attributes);
068    governingScopeId = Objects.requireNonNull(governingScopeId, "governingScopeId");
069  }
070
071  @Override // Constable
072  public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<Id>> describeConstable() {
073    return Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes())
074      .flatMap(attributesDesc -> this.governingScopeId().describeConstable()
075               .flatMap(governingScopeIdDesc -> types.describeConstable()
076                        .map(typesDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
077                                                                 MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_Id,
078                                                                                                CD_BeanTypeList,
079                                                                                                CD_List,
080                                                                                                CD_NamedAttributeMap,
081                                                                                                CD_int),
082                                                                 typesDesc,
083                                                                 attributesDesc,
084                                                                 governingScopeIdDesc,
085                                                                 this.rank()))));
086  }
087
088}
